alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Pope; Saline (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 03 at 11:48AM CST until March 03 at 12:15PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM CST FOR HARDIN...NORTHEASTERN POPE...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE...GALLATIN... NORTHWESTERN CRITTENDEN AND SOUTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 1148 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Equality to 7 miles northwest of Marion, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. These storms have a history of wind damage. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Eldorado, Sturgis, Shawneetown, Rosiclare, Ridgway, Equality, New Haven, Cave-in-Rock, Elizabethtown, Omaha, Old Shawneetown, Junction, Karbers Ridge and Gross. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for southern Illinois...and western and northwestern Kentucky. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CST for southern and southeastern Illinois...and southwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
